mapper.insert: insert into express_order (user_id, pay_id, courier_id, express_id, order_status) values (#{userId}, #{payId}, #{courierId}, #{expressId}, #{orderStatus})
mapper.select: select o.order_id orderId, region_name regionName, a.pick_up_address pickUpAddress, a.receive_address receiveAddress, e.name name, e.express_number expressNumber, e.express_company expressCompany, e.express_code expressCode, e.phone_number phoneNumber, e.express_type expressType, c.courier_id courierId, c.name courierName, c.phone_number courierPhoneNumber, e.fee fee, p.pay_id payId, o.create_time createTime, o.order_status orderStatus from express_order o inner join express e on o.express_id = e.express_id inner join address a on a.address_id = e.address_id inner join region on a.region_id = region.region_id inner join pay p on p.pay_id = o.pay_id left join ( select c.courier_id, user.name, user.phone_number from user inner join courier c on user.id = c.user_id ) c on o.courier_id = c.courier_id where o.user_id = #{userId};
